titles.title: A bill for the relief of Lynette J. Parker.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.
Reported to House by House Committee on The Judiciary. Report No: 100-845.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Passed Over by House Without Prejudice.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Passed Over by House Without Prejudice.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Passed Over by House Without Prejudice.

bill.summary: 9/9/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the classification of a named individual, the widow of a U.S. citizen, as an immediate relative within the meaning of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
